resources.name: create employer
resources.description:
## Fields => Body
```
{
   firstName: Joi.string().min(2).max(32).required(),
   lastName: Joi.string().min(2).max(32).required(),
   
   company: Joi.object()
      .keys({
		name: Joi.string().min(2).max(32).required(),
		website: Joi.string().min(10).max(32).default(null),
		tagline: Joi.string().min(2).max(32).default(null),
		description: Joi.string().min(5).max(200).required(),
	})
	.required(),
      
   avatar: Joi.string().required(),
   
   phone: Joi.object()
      .keys({
        	phoneNumber: Joi.string().required(),
  })
  .required(),
      
  location: Joi.object()
      .keys({
          country: Joi.string().min(4).max(32).required(),
          street: Joi.string().min(5).max(70).required(),
          city: Joi.string().min(5).max(70).required(),
          zip: Joi.number().integer().default(null),
  })
  .required(),
      
}

```

## Fields => Headers
- Bearer Token*     (string)


### Note
-  * denote mandatory

params.name: workDetails
params.value: We're an education company.We want to be able to create quiz with around 10 questions. each question has a few possible answers. the user selects the right answer (one or more correct answer). the user answers 10 questions. then at the end, we ask the user email. and we collect and store that information (number of correct responses + email address). then we will manually send the user's correct answers by email.
